Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Dear Sirs and Madams,

I purchased an iPhone 13 from you.
Unfortunately, I need to return the device due to personal reasons. Here are the details of the device:
Model: iPhone 13
Color: Gold
Storage size: 256 Gb
Please let me know the procedure for returning the item. I would like a prompt processing of my request.
Thank you very much for your support.
Best regards,
Hossein Abdollahi

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

The refund has been processed.

Regards,
JH
